fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, send a player "haiiiiii omg ^_^ hi!! hiiiii <3 hi :3 (threat)". Tomorrow day, that player must have "hai" "hi" "omg" "<3" or ":3" in all of their sentences in any variation (ex variation: haiiiiii). All sentences must have at least four exclamation marks in them.
- At night, point out any message a player you selected the previous night made during the day that did not contain the proper vocabulary. Modkill them.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Modkill someone (haiiiiii omg ^_^ hi!!!! hiiiiii <3 hi :3)
